sequenceDiagram
        actor User as User
        participant WebUI as WebUI
        participant Server as Server
        participant MailService as MailService
        participant Database as Database
        
        User->>+ WebUI : 1. Access for password page
        WebUI ->>+ Server : 2. PUT / change-password{}

     
            Server ->> +MailService : 4. sendMail(to, subject, body)
            MailService ->> MailService : 5. Acknowledge email sent
            %% Server -->> -WebUI : 6. 200 / {meta, message}
            MailService -->>- User :6. sendMail()
            User ->> WebUI: 7. Input  OTP for verification
            WebUI ->> WebUI: 7. Display change password page
            User ->> WebUI: 8. Input old password, new password, confirm new password
            WebUI ->> Server : 9. PUT / update-password{old password, new password}

            alt Update successfully
                Server ->> +Database : 10. Update password
                Database -->> Server : 10. Acknowledge password updated
                Server -->> WebUI : 11. 200 / {meta, message}
                WebUI -->> User : 12. Display successful message
            else Update failed
                Database -->> -Server : 10. Acknowledge password update failed
                Server -->>- WebUI : 11. 400 / {meta, message}
                WebUI -->> -User : 12. Display error message
            end
